verses.text: \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, thou hast been \w favourable|strong="H7521"\w* unto thy \w land|strong="H0776"\w*: thou hast brought \w back|strong="H7725"\w* the \w captivity|strong="H7622"\w* of \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*.\f + \fr 85.1 \ft for the sons: or, of the sons\f*\f + \fr 85.1 \ft favourable: or, well pleased\f*

Thou hast \w forgiven|strong="H5375"\w* the \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* of thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, thou hast \w covered|strong="H3680"\w* all their \w sin|strong="H2403"\w*. \w Selah|strong="H5542"\w*.

Thou hast taken \w away|strong="H0622"\w* all thy \w wrath|strong="H5678"\w*: thou hast \w turned|strong="H7725"\w* \add thyself\add* from the \w fierceness|strong="H2740"\w* of thine \w anger|strong="H0639"\w*.\f + \fr 85.3 \ft thyselfâ€¦: or, thine anger from waxing hot\f*
\w Turn|strong="H7725"\w* us, O \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of our \w salvation|strong="H3468"\w*, and cause thine \w anger|strong="H3708"\w* toward us to \w cease|strong="H6565"\w*.

Wilt thou be \w angry|strong="H0599"\w* with us for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*? wilt thou draw \w out|strong="H4900"\w* thine \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* to \w all|strong="H1755"\w* \w generations|strong="H1755"\w*?
Wilt thou not \w revive|strong="H2421"\w* us \w again|strong="H7725"\w*: that thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w* may \w rejoice|strong="H8055"\w* in thee?
\w Shew|strong="H7200"\w* us thy \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and \w grant|strong="H5414"\w* us thy \w salvation|strong="H3468"\w*.

I will \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* what \w God|strong="H0410"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* will \w speak|strong="H1696"\w*: for he will \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* unto his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and to his \w saints|strong="H2623"\w*: but let them not turn \w again|strong="H7725"\w* to \w folly|strong="H3690"\w*.

Surely his \w salvation|strong="H3468"\w* \add is\add* \w nigh|strong="H7138"\w* them that \w fear|strong="H3373"\w* him; that \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* may \w dwell|strong="H7931"\w* in our \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.

\w Mercy|strong="H2617"\w* and \w truth|strong="H0571"\w* are met \w together|strong="H6298"\w*; \w righteousness|strong="H6664"\w* and \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* have \w kissed|strong="H5401"\w* \add each other\add*.

\w Truth|strong="H0571"\w* shall spring \w out|strong="H6779"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*; and \w righteousness|strong="H6664"\w* shall look \w down|strong="H8259"\w* from \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*.

Yea, the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \add that which is\add* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*; and our \w land|strong="H0776"\w* shall \w yield|strong="H5414"\w* her \w increase|strong="H2981"\w*.

\w Righteousness|strong="H6664"\w* shall \w go|strong="H1980"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* him; and shall \w set|strong="H7760"\w* \add us\add* in the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of his \w steps|strong="H6471"\w*.
